title.en: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau

altTitles.ja: 魔女大戦 32人の異才の魔女は殺し合う

altTitles.en: The Great Witch War: 32 Genius Witches Kill Each Other
The War of Greedy Witches: 32 of the Wickedest Women Duel to the Death

description.en:
Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches”.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0171)
**Official English Volumes:** [Yen Press](https://yenpress.com/series/the-war-of-greedy-witches)
description.ja: フランスを救った奇跡の英雄ジャンヌ・ダルク。火刑に処され、その生涯を終えようとしていた彼女は死の間際、別世界へと飛ばされてしまう。そこにいたのはその名を歴史に刻み、「魔女」と呼ばれる32人の女傑たちであった。そして、最後の「魔女」ジャンヌダルクが揃い、欲深き魔女たちの殺し合い魔女千夜血戦の開幕が告げられるーー!!
description.ru: История о 32 исторических женщинах, в том числе Жанне д'Арк, Клеопатре, Томоэ Гозэн и Марии Антуанетте - названых «алчными ведьмами», сражающихся насмерть, ради исполнения своего желания.
description.uk: Тридцять дві відьми з усієї історії борються на смерть у Вальпургієву ніч, щоби виконати свої бажання. Жанна д'Арк, Клеопатра, Томое Ґодзен, Марія Антуанетта та інші.

altTitles.ja: オトナを知りたい女友達
My Galpals are Cumming of Age

altTitles.en: My Galpal Wants An Adult Understanding
My Girl Friend Wants An Adult Understanding

description.en:
20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth, he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is… appreciating lewd vide*s. “I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs”. A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love…… However one day, his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place!

Then, she says something shocking to Tatsurou, who thinks the world is ending.

“I-is it fine if I watch the AV together with you……?”

Watch it together with your innocent galpal with an immoral atmosphere! A vid-life story where male desires are laid bare with a gal!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/watch/mg878860)

title.en: The Suspicious Boy Is One of the World's Top Ten Masters

description.en:
In the aftermath of Madorim's decline following the World War, a captivating tale unfolds as the maternal grandson, son of Lord Daesannim's daughter, returns to the city. Despite initial feelings of abandonment, he emerges as a figure of unexpected beauty in a martial arts world marked by rugged aesthetics.

Unveiling his true identity as the King of the Mu-myeon Mountain, a teenage expert who conquered the Dragon King of the Yellow River, the series promises a gripping narrative. Driven by his mother's last words and a determination to restore Madorim to its former glory, Jin Murip, this unparalleled teenage expert, arrives in Madorim.

title.en: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!

altTitles.zh: 我靠无敌被动打出成吨伤害！

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Kao Wudi Beidong Dachu Cheng Dun Shanghai!
Wǒ Kào Wúdí Bèidòng Dǎchū Chéng Dūn Shānghài!

description.en: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of ‘God’ across all professions in the game ‘Genesis,’ poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the game’s top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to ‘Genesis,’ a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.
description.zh: 前一世，程谦墨在游戏《天启》获得了全职业神职称呼，即将站上世界之巅，但在距离游戏第一人仅有一步之遥时，遗憾败北。可世界给了程谦墨第二次的机会，让他意外穿越到了一个设定竟然与《天启》一模一样，全民转职的世界。拥有全职业神级称号的他，决定完成曾经的遗憾，走上一条从未有人走过的道路。

title.en: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree

altTitles.zh-ro: Cóng Dà Shù Kāishǐ De Jìnhuà

altTitles.ja: 進化する者たち

altTitles.vi: Chuyển Sinh Thành Liễu Đột Biến

altTitles.ru: Моё перерождение в древо: Начало эволюции

description.en:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
description.ru:
После смерти Юй Цзыюй перерождается и становится… Ивой! 
И неизвестно, сумеет ли он приспособиться к такой знакомой, но в то же время чуждой окружающей среде – ведь так совпало, что его перерождение случилось как раз во время Великой эпохи возрождения духовной энергии. 
Возрождение духовной энергии знаменует возвышение всех существ… 
Рев хищных зверей стал способен сотрясти горы и взволновать реки, а существа с могущественной силой наводнили этот мир в таком количестве, что он вот-вот лопнет по швам. 
Но, несмотря на все это, во время подобной эпохи выросла величественная ива, способная безгранично развиваться и эволюционировать. 
Плоды, что растут на ней, способны даровать другим необычайные способности, а духовная энергия, которую она распространяет, укрепляет силы зверей, что обитают на ее территории. 
… 
Одни величают ее мировым древом – Иггдрасилем, день за днем восславляя его существование! 
Другие – «великим божественным древом», подпирающим небосвод! 
Разумеется, большинство просто зовут его «священным древом», или «проклятым деревом», или же «дьявольским деревом»… Да и еще много как. 
И все же, при любом его упоминании в голосе каждого ясно слышится благоговейный трепет.
description.zh: 黑鸟社新作，重生成为一株柳树！？灵气复苏，万物崛起。重生的柳树也走上了进化之路。能够无限进化的它，是“神力”还是“诅咒”？

altTitles.ja: カウンタック

description.en:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

altTitles.en: Ma'am, Your Mask Has Fallen Off Again

description.en:
Mother always said to Qinran: "Your stepfather is from a famous family, your eldest brother is a genius, and your sister is a top student in her high school. You, a country bumpkin, don't embarrass them."

Everyone with status in the capital received a warning from Mr. Juan of the Cheng family: "Mr. Juan's wife is from the countryside and doesn't understand our current situation, and she has a bad temper. In short, everyone should be extra patient."

Until one day, when Master Juan was investigating a certain big boss, his men fell into a confused silence while looking at one of the waistcoats of his sister-in-law who claimed to know nothing…

title.en: Muda da to Tsuihou Sareta [Kyuutei Juui], Kemono no Kuni ni Kou Taiguu de Manekareru: Mori de Tasuketa Shinjuu to Kemomimi Bishoujotachi ni Mechakucha Dekiaisare Nagara Slow Life o Tanoshinderu

altTitles.ja: 無駄だと追放された【宮廷獣医】、獣の国に好待遇で招かれる～森で助けた神獣とケモ耳美少女達にめちゃくちゃ溺愛されながらスローライフを楽しんでる～

altTitles.ja-ro: Muda da to Tsuihou Sareta [Kyuutei Juui], Kemono no Kuni ni Kou Taiguu de Manekareru ~Mori de Tasuketa Shinjuu to Kemomimi Bishoujo-tachi ni Mechakucha Dekiaisare Nagara Slow Life o Tanoshinderu~

altTitles.en: Banished by the [Royal Court] After Being Told I Was Useless, I Got Invited to the Beast Country Promising Good Treatment: Enjoying a Slow Life While Being Doted on by the Divine Beast and the Animal-Eared Beauties I Saved in the Forest

description.en:
One day, veterinary doctor Zeke is suddenly fired by the king, leaving him with nowhere to go but at a loss. However, after helping a divine beast, he is invited to the beast kingdom with excellent treatment. 

After Zeke is banished, the kingdom begins to decline, but he begins living happily surrounded by cute animal-eared girls. 

From Let's Become a Novelist! comes the he long-awaited comic adaptation of the hugely popular harem slow life packed with fluffy and cute animal-eared girls!

(Source: Bookwalker)
description.ja: ある日突然国王からクビを宣告された獣ノ医師・ジークは、行く当てがなくなり途方に暮れるが、神獣を助けたことにより超好待遇で獣人国に招かれることになる。そしてジークを追放したことで衰退が始まる国を尻目に、ケモ耳美少女たちに囲まれた幸せな日々が始まるのであった――。「小説家になろう」発!もふもふ×ケモ耳美少女凝縮で大人気のハーレムスローライフが待望のコミカライズ!!

description.en: The apocalypse has dawned upon the world, and food and survival are once again the most important topics of people's concern. Rice and flour have become luxuries, and vegetables are even more expensive! But just then, someone posted a video on a website that shocked the world. Sweet vegetables rolled into a hot pot, emitting a tantalizing green color! A golden leg of lamb is seared in oil! Fish soup simmers as white as milk! The little girl beside me begged: Bro,  I really can't eat anymore!
description.zh: 末日来袭，植物与水源全部枯竭。世界陷入恐慌，食物与生存再次成为人们最关心的话题。米面成为奢侈品，菜蔬更是有价无市！然而就在此时，有人在网站上发送一段视频，令世界震撼。甘甜的菜蔬滚入火锅中，散发诱人的绿色！烤的金黄的羊腿滋滋冒油！鲜美的鱼汤炖的宛若牛奶一般纯白！一旁的小女孩哀求道：哥，我真的吃不下了！

altTitles.ja: 美味しんぼ

description.en:
Around the offices of Tozai News, Shiro Yamaoka has a reputation for being over-blunt, under-ambitious, and generally an all-around slacker. So why has he been given the important job of coming up with the "Ultimate Menu" to celebrate the newspaper's 100th anniversary? Because he possesses qualities his other colleagues don't: an exquisitely discerning palate, an encyclopedic knowledge of food and drink, and a masterful touch in the kitchen.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Seinen/General in 1987**

altTitles.en: The Servant Is the Demon King?!

altTitles.vi: Đại Quản Gia Là Ma Hoàng

description.en:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
description.vi: Ma Hoàng Trác Nhất Phàm vì nhặt được một truyền thừa của Thượng Cổ Ma Đế, mà dẫn đến họa sát thân. Sau khi được trọng sinh vào một cơ thể khác, cũng bởi vì tâm ma của chủ nhân cơ thể cũ, mà không còn cách nào khác, phải làm quản gia cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé. Cùng xem một đại ma hoàng đầy thủ đoạn tàn độc, sẽ làm thế nào để khiến cho một gia tộc nhỏ bé trở mình thành một gia tộc đứng trên tất cả.
description.pt-br: O protagonista é um imperador mágico e o homem mais forte vivo, ele é traido pelo seu subordinado e é morto, após isso ele reencarna em um menino sem cultivo e começa a trilhar seu caminho para a vingança.

title.en: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-

altTitles.es: Templo - Nadie puede vivir en soledad

altTitles.ja: てんぷる

altTitles.de: TenPuru: Von Einsamkeit kann man nicht leben

description.en: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
description.es: Así es, me volveré un monje! Al no saber qué hacer con sus deseos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu aspira a llevar una vida estoica. Sin embargo, la espesa corriente de energía del karma que fluye en él no lo permitirá.
description.es-la: "É isso mesmo, eu vou me tornar um monge!". Sem saber o que fazer com seus desejos mundanos, Akagami Akemitsu decide viver uma vida estóica. No entanto, o sangue cármico espesso que flui nele não permitirá!

description.en:
By chaos, the world began to be invaded.

One day, gates suddenly appeared in the world, unleashing monsters upon humanity.

The situation brought humanity to the brink of extinction.

The martial world of “Eun,” the world of magic and knights “Einhart,”

and the world of demons “Gehenna” became interconnected, and superhumans from these worlds swept away the monsters.

However, they were not righteous saviors.

Under the law of survival of the fittest, the newly emerged “Players” of Earth were oppressed.

Lee Ro-Woon sought to mediate between the Players and the superhumans from other worlds, aiming to bring peace to the world.

But due to the discomfort of the superhumans from other worlds with his actions and the betrayal of his comrades,

Lee Ro-Woon lost everything and fell into ruin.

At the moment he was about to give up everything, he became the vessel of chaos and was transported to a sealed world.

There, he encountered three supreme beings.

Lee Ro-Woon becomes the disciple of the Three Kings and rises to rule over everything!

altTitles.ja: 電影少女

description.en: High-school student Yota Moteuchi is so unpopular that his classmates have given him the nickname "Dateless." So it's no surprise when the love of his life, Moemi, is not interested in Yota but instead is in love with Yota's best friend, Takashi. Yota turns to a video rental shop for comfort, but little did he suspect that the shop was magical and that the cute girl on his rented tape would pop out of the television and try to fix his ruined love life!

title.en: A Girl Who Sees Through The Kindness That Derives From Sexual Desire

altTitles.ja: 性欲由来の優しさ見抜き女子

altTitles.ja-ro: Seiyoku Yurai no Yasashisa Minuki Joshi

title.en: I Will Be a Black Lotus in My Next Life

altTitles.ja: 悪女の仮面 転生罪妻の復讐

altTitles.zh: 转生誓做黑莲花，罪妻要复仇

description.en: A trap carefully designed by her best friend turned Wangshu from a sweet wife into a prisoner? After being wrongly killed, she was reincarnated in the body of her best friend's depressed sister Suya! She vowed to make the mastermind pay a terrible price at all costs, save the family business and regain happiness!

altTitles.ja: ディノサン

description.en: In 1946, someone discovered an island where dinosaurs had survived into the present. Through breeding and genetic manipulation, humans managed to increase their population and supercharge their popularity! Until, well... the unfortunate accident, when people's attitudes soured on the idea of visiting dinosaurs. This story follows a rookie zookeeper who is newly hired at Enoshima Dinoland, a struggling dinosaur sanctuary, and the fascinating creatures who need specialized love and care!
description.eu:
1946an irla batean dinosauro biziak aurkitu zirenetik, ugalketa programek eta edizio genetikoek narrasti galduak erabat berreskuratzea lortu zuten.
Haien presentzia ikaragarriak mundu osoko jendea xarmatu zuen, baina istripu batez geroztik fokuetatik urrun gelditu dira.
Halako egun batez, Suzume Suma zaintzaile gisa hasi da gainbeheran dagoen Enoshima Dinoland dinosauro parkean.

Iturria: Harriet Ediciones
description.vi: Vào năm 1946, có người phát hiện ra một hòn đảo nơi khủng long đã sống sót cho đến hiện tại. Thông qua việc lai tạo và biến đổi gen, con người đã có thể gia tăng dân số và tăng cường sự nổi tiếng của chúng! Cho đến khi, ừm... một tai nạn đáng tiếc, khi thái độ của mọi người trở nên tệ hơn với ý tưởng đến thăm khủng long. Câu chuyện này kể về một người trông coi sở thú mới vào nghề, người mới được thuê tại Enoshima Dinoland, một khu bảo tồn khủng long đang gặp khó khăn, và những sinh vật hấp dẫn cần tình yêu thương và sự chăm sóc đặc biệt!

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: The Lecture You Would Never Want Your Parents to Give You

altTitles.ja: 親に絶対されたくない説教

altTitles.fr: Le sermon que vous ne voudriez jamais recevoir de vos parents

altTitles.ru: Лекция, которую вы бы не хотели услышать от родителей

altTitles.vi: Bài Thuyết Giáo mà ta Không bao giờ Muốn nghe từ phụ Huynh

altTitles.es-la: El regaño que nunca quisieras recibir de tus padres
La charla que nunca quieres que te den tus padres.

altTitles.pl: Wykład, którego nie chciałbyś od rodziców

altTitles.ja: しのびごと

description.en: Even in modern Japan, ninja still hide in the shadows. Young ninja Yodaka has received his mission--protect high school student Aoi at all cost. But can a ninja survive the wild world of high school while also fulfilling his mission?
description.ja: 時は現代！世を忍び悪を討つ公安忍部隊のヨダカは、女子高生・向日アオイの護衛を命じられる。極端にコミュニケーションが苦手なヨダカは目立たず生徒となりアオイを護る予定が、何故か彼女と友達になり!?
description.pt-br: Mesmo no Japão moderno, os ninjas ainda se escondem nas sombras. O jovem ninja Yodaka recebeu sua missão: proteger a estudante do ensino médio Aoi a todo custo. Mas um ninja pode sobreviver ao mundo selvagem do ensino médio e ao mesmo tempo cumprir sua missão?

title.en: Isshou Watashi no Joshu de ite!

altTitles.ja: 一生わたしの助手でいて！

description.en:
"The relationship between a detective and their assistant is not unlike romance!"

Due to his natural tendency to assist others (a "helper type" personality that makes him constantly want to lend a hand), Mitomo Tasuku had always lived in the shadows. To break out of this, he made it his life's mission to "become number one." However, at the high school he transfers to, he encounters three detective girls, who happen to be his rivals from elementary school with whom he formed a detective club together. Thus begins Tasuku's fierce battle for the top detective spot! However... these girls seem to harbor passionate feelings of a different kind...!?
description.ja: 持ち前の助手体質(つい手助けをしてしまう体質)のせいで日陰者だった御供助玖は、その状況を打破するため「トップになる」ことを最重要課題として生きてきた。しかし、転校先の高校で出会った探偵少女3人は、小学校の頃に探偵団を一緒にやっていた因縁の相手だった! 探偵(トップ)の座をかけた助玖の熱い戦いが始まる!! ただ‥‥彼女たちは違う意味で熱い想いを秘めていて‥‥!?

altTitles.ja: 王子様の友達
A Prince of a Friend
学園の王子様とハグする話

altTitles.ja-ro: Gakuen no Ouji-sama to Hagu Suru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story About Hugging the School Prince

altTitles.pt-br: A história sobre abraçar o príncipe da escola

description.en:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
description.pt-br:
Estou sempre à mercê do príncipe!?
Uma comédia romântica pastelão com uma garota linda!

title.en: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible

altTitles.zh: 完了啊！女帝的软饭丈夫居然无敌

altTitles.zh-ro: Wanliao Ah! Nvdi De Ruan Fan Zhangfu Juran Wudi

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

altTitles.ja-ro: Sasayaku you ni Koi o Utau

altTitles.ja: ささやくように恋を唄う

altTitles.pt-br: Sussurrando Uma Canção De Amor Para Você

description.en: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…
description.es: Himari comienza la escuela secundaria y en su primer día atiende el concierto del club de música ligera en el gimnasio de la escuela, enamorándose a primera vista con la cantante Yori y confesándole su amor en los casilleros de zapatos. Buscándo a dicha cantante, Himari se entera de que Yori no es parte del mencionado club y que a ella le gusta tocar música sola en la terraza de la escuela. Allí, se entera de que Yori también se enamoró de ella.
description.fr: Himari est une lycéenne de première année qui, dès le premier jour, assiste à la représentation du club de musique au gymnase de l'école. Elle a eu le coup de foudre pour la chanteuse Yori, à qui elle s'est déclarée devant les casiers du lycée. En cherchant ledit élève plus tard, elle découvre qu'elle ne fait pas vraiment partie du club et qu'elle aime jouer de la musique seule sur le toit. Là, elle découvre que Yori aussi est tombée amoureuse d'elle.
description.ru:
Химари влюбилась в солистку группы, которая выступала на приветственной вечеринке новых студентов. После разговора с Химари Ёри — солистка группы — поняла, что влюбилась в неё с первого взгляда...

---

(Source: [readmanga](https://readmanga.io/proshepchu_tebe_pesniu_o_liubvi__A5238))
description.uk: Життєрадісна, енергійна старшокласниця Хімарі по вуха закохалася у свого семпая, на ім'я Йорі після того, як почула виступ її групи першого дня навчання. Хімарі відразу зізнається Йорі у своїх почуттях і на подив Хімарі, Йорі каже, що вона теж закохана в неї! Але коли Хімарі розуміє, що вони відчувають два різні види кохання, вона починає ставити собі питання, що ж насправді означає "любов".
description.es-la: "Whispering you a love song" es la historia de un amor a primera vista que inicia en la temporada de los cerezos en flor. Himari, una nueva estudiante de la preparatoria, queda fascinada por Yori-senpai, la vocalista de la banda de chicas que se presenta en la ceremonia de inauguración del año escolar.
description.pt-br: Himari é uma caloura do ensino médio que no primeiro dia assiste a apresentação do clube de música light na academia da escola, apaixonando-se pelo veterano e cantor Yori à primeira vista, confessando-se a ela nos armários dos sapatos. Mais tarde, procurando pelo dito veterano, Himari descobre que Yori não faz parte do clube e que, em vez disso, gosta de tocar música sozinha no telhado. Lá, ela descobre que Yori também se apaixonou por ela.

altTitles.ja: 若葉ちゃんはわからせたい！

altTitles.en: Wakaba-chan Wants To Make Him Understand!
Wakaba-chan Wants to Make It Clear

description.en:
Four-eyes who's bad with girls is only able to talk to with his tomboyish childhood friend Wakaba. But one day Wakaba appears before him in an amazingly cute outfit...!? 

This is a battle rom-com between Wakaba who wants to be loved and four-eyes who gets flustered by girls!!
description.ja: 『絶対BLになる世界VS絶対BLになりたくない男』の紺吉が贈るTwitter発ラブコメが、新連載開始！　女子が苦手な男子高校生のメガネくんは幼馴染のボーイッシュ女子・若葉とだけは会話ができる。でもある日、若葉がとびきり可愛い服装で現れて…!?　メガネくんに好かれたい若葉さんと女子にドキマギしちゃうメガネくんとのすれ違い＆攻防戦ラブコメ!!

altTitles.en: You’re So Cute What Should I Do

description.en:
Forget "saving face," this is "saved by face!"
Roseny has been masquerading as a boy for years at the orphanage. But when the duke chooses her to be a playmate for his son, it isn't long before her secret is revealed. Instead of being sent back, her adorable complexion results in Roseny being adopted! What will this new future hold for her?

title.en: I Will Break Ties With the Harmful Sister

altTitles.ja: 害悪姉と決別します

description.en:
Clara, who had been oppressed for many years by her tyrant sister, Enefia. Even their parents obeyed the sister's wishes, and Clara had no place in the Astraia Baron’s household despite it being her home. In the midst of this, Clara's sister's engagement to a prominent nobleman was decided, and Clara finally felt relieved, believing she would be freed from this hell. However, even after the engagement, the sister's unfaithful nature did not change, and fearing the fiance might discover the inconvenient truth, the parents ordered Clara to monitor her sister. Despite Clara's efforts, her sister became pregnant with another man's child. The engagement was broken off, and the sister quickly eloped somewhere, leaving the Astraia Baron’s household with a huge debt, angering the influential nobleman. In order to repay her family's debts, Clara was sold to a sadistic noble and faced severe torture, ultimately approaching death.

"If I could do it over again... This time, I will definitely kill you!" When Clara opened her eyes again, time had rewound to the day of her sister’s engagement. Revived with strong determination, Clara pushed back against her sister's insidious bullying and ran to change the worst possible future.

title.en: I Ran Away and Got Married

description.en:
“You’re mine.”

When Raphia met her demise after having been used and thrown away by her benefactor, Yuri, she went back nine years in the past.

‘I’m not going to relive that hell!’

Running away from her benefactor, she went to Kasein Soleia, Yuri’s archnemesis, and signed a new sponsorship contract with him.

“I shall kill every single person you despise, Milord.”

“The necessary role happens to be open, and you might just be the right person for it.”

Young Duke. This is a sponsorship contract, right? But why . . . why are we getting married?

===

“Throughout the time I won’t be by your side . . . I will think of nothing but your small, cute head.”

That low voice sent shivers down her spine.

“I can’t believe you’re leaving. I’ll just . . .”

Kasein looked at her sharply as if he was daring her to continue making up excuses.

“You have to answer well, brat. Depending on what you say, all the wagon and shoe craftsmen of the Empire might lose their livelihood.”

Despite his harsh words, Kasein’s touch was gentle. He couldn’t take his eyes off of Raphia, who strangely grew more beautiful by the day.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%84%EB%A7%9D%EC%B3%A4%EB%8D%94%EB%8B%88-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC%EC%9D%84-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%8C-%EB%90%90%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3299), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61190666)

title.en: The Strange Adventure of a Broke Mercenary

altTitles.ja: 食い詰め傭兵の幻想奇譚
Fantasie Geshichte von soldner in groBer Armut

altTitles.en: The Strange Fantasy Story Of A Broke Mercenary

altTitles.th: เรื่องราวการผจญภัยสุดประหลาดของนายทหารถังแตก

altTitles.de: Fantasie Geschichte eines Söldners in Armut

description.en:
After the soldiers’ mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)

title.en: Kao dake yoi Classmate ga Yatara to Guigui Kuru Yuri no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 顔だけ良いクラスメイトがやたらとグイグイ来る百合の話

altTitles.en: A Yuri Story About How My Classmate Whose Only Good Trait Is Her Excessively Pretty Face Comes at Me Relentlessly
The Male Lead Is in Charge of the Successor
The Dark History of the Male Lead

altTitles.th: พระเอกบอกให้ฉันรับผิดชอบยุคมืดของเขา

altTitles.ja: 黒歴史の責任を取れですって!?

altTitles.zh: 男主要我对他的黑历史负责

description.en: After being neglected in her past life, Izelle is ecstatic to be reborn as a rich character until her family suddenly goes bankrupt! While thinking about what to do, she's given the perfect chance to solve her financial crisis when she saves young Archduke Karl Byron from being bullied. Unfortunately, Karl doesn't remember her at all when they reunite as adults, and she has no choice but to coerce him into helping her. Can Izelle get what she wants, or will Karl be more trouble than he's worth?

altTitles.ja: さるまね

description.en:
Despite the food shortages caused by famine, the mountain village where the protagonist Kai lives is able to pursue a somewhat better life than others by hunting wild animals. However, one day, a man who says he got lost in the mountains comes to the village. Kai is suspicious of the man, who refuses to make eye contact, but he and his family welcome him. That night, another uninvited beast though sneaks into the outskirts of the village…
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0202)
description.ja: 天明三年。世では飢饉による食糧難のなかでも、主人公の可畏が住む山村では野生の動物を狩ることで他よりも幾分良い生活ができていた。しかし、ある日山で迷ったという男が村に来る。一向に目を合わせようとしないその男を訝しむ可畏だが、家族とともにもてなす。そしてその夜、村の外れではさらなる招かれざる獣が入り込んでいた...。
description.es-la: Tercer año de la era Temmei. En medio de la escasez de alimentos provocada por la hambruna, el pueblo de montaña donde vive el protagonista Kaei consigue ganarse la vida algo mejor que los demás cazando animales salvajes. Un día, sin embargo, llega a la aldea un hombre que afirma haberse perdido en las montañas. El hombre se niega a mirar a Kaei a los ojos, pero él y su familia le reciben con los brazos abiertos. Esa noche, en las afueras de la aldea, entran más bestias no invitadas...

altTitles.ja: キングダム ハーツ 358/2 Days

description.en: In Kingdom Hearts, Sora turned the Keyblade on himself in order to release Kairi's heart, but his heart was also released in the process. This brought about the creation of Roxas, Sora's Nobody. Unlike most Nobodies, however, Roxas has no memories of his past. He joins Oragnization XIII and slowly begins to discover the truth behind his existence and the Organization itself. He meets and befriends the fourteenth member of the Organization, who also has no recollection of her past. What will Roxas see during his time in the Organization? What is the connection between him, Sora, and the fourteenth member? And what becomes of them? Dive into the heart of Kingdom Hearts storyline's biggest secret.

altTitles.ja: まじとら！

description.en:
Minami-kun spots a poster recruiting new members for the Magical Girl Club. Thinking "Cosplay cuties woohoo!" he decides to join… What the hell!? It's not cosplay, we actually become magical girls??  
  
A slice of life love-comedy revolving around magical girls and slippery slopes.
description.es:
Minami-kun ve un cartel para llamar la atención a aquellos interesados en unirse al Club de Chicas Mágicas. Pensando en "¡Ver chicas guapas en cosplay, yujuu!" decide entrar... ¿¡Pero qué demonios!? Esto no es un cosplay, ¿de verdad nos hemos transformado en chicas mágicas?

Una comedia romántica que gira en torno a las chicas mágicas y situaciones peligrosas.
description.ru:
Минами-кун заметил постер с приглашением в Клуб Девочек-Волшебниц. Подумав: «Ничоси, халявный косплей!», он решил присоединиться… Вот только он не знал, что это не косплей, а он сам станет Девочкой-волшебницей!  
  
  
Originally found on MinComi: <http://www.mincomi.jp/title/?title=327416>  
Twitter [@yutakashii](https://twitter.com/yutakashii)  
Pixiv: <http://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=200861>  
<http://www.ebookjapan.jp/ebj/author/78088/>

altTitles.en: The Best Medical God in the City

altTitles.ja: 一族を滅ぼされた俺が最強の力を手に入れて帰ってきた

description.en:
Five years ago, the Ye family was destroyed, and the trash Ye Chen disappeared mysteriously. Now, and the trash Ye Chen is back! He came back with a cultivating body that penetrated the heavens and the earth and cried, "Ghosts and gods!" 

This time, Ye Chen wants to make the sky fall in awe! Let the Earth tremble! To be in control of everything, to the top of the sky!

altTitles.ja: メッシュ

description.en:
The story follows the life of a teenage boy named "Mesh," so-called for his unique "mesh"-colored hair: blonde with silver strands on the sides. It begins with a scene where Mesh, after being beaten, escapes from a mob and encounters Milon, a forger and painter. Mesh ends up staying at Milon’s house, and the two form an unlikely bond as they navigate life together. Each chapter is a poetic blend of crime, peaceful everyday moments, or the vibrant nightlife of artists in a fictionalized Paris.

"Mesh" is regarded as one of Hagio Moto’s defining works, marking a pivotal shift in her artistic style. It was her first series to adopt a more realistic look while retaining the ethereal beauty characteristic of 1970s shōjo art. The story ventures into more mature themes while continuing to explore Hagio's recurring motifs, such as parent-child relationships and adolescence.
description.vi:
"Mesh" kể về một phần tuổi niên thiếu của cậu bé cùng tên, biệt danh bắt nguồn từ mái tóc vàng pha bạc đặc trưng. Câu chuyện mở đầu với cảnh Mesh vừa bị xã hội đen hành hung, tình cờ gặp Milon, một họa sĩ chuyên vẽ tranh nhái. Mesh ở lại nhà Milon, và giữa hai người hình thành một mối liên kết kỳ lạ. Mỗi chương là sự kết hợp đầy chất thơ giữa thế giới tội phạm, những khoảnh khắc đời thường yên bình, và nhịp sống sôi động của các nghệ sĩ tại một Paris huyền ảo được Hagio phác họa.

Tác phẩm này được coi là dấu mốc quan trọng trong sự nghiệp của Hagio Moto, đánh dấu sự chuyển mình lớn trong phong cách nghệ thuật của cô. Đây là loạt truyện đầu tiên của cô mang nét vẽ hiện thực hơn, trong khi vẫn giữ được nét mềm mại đặc trưng của dòng shōjo những năm 1970. Câu chuyện khai thác các chủ đề trưởng thành hơn trước, đồng thời tiếp tục đào sâu những motif quen thuộc trong sáng tác của Hagio, như mối quan hệ cha mẹ - con cái và các vấn đề tâm lý tuổi trẻ.

altTitles.ja: ディーふらぐ！

altTitles.th: ชมรมรั่วมหากาฬ!

description.en: Kazama Kenji likes to believe he is something of a delinquent. Moreover, others seem to like to agree that he is. Of course, Kenji's gang finds their way to a group of four not-so-normal girls - Chitose, Sakura, Minami and Roka - and all at once, whatever reputation he may have, is nothing compared to the outrageous behavior of the girls. Shanghaied into joining their club, what will happen to his everyday life from that point on?
description.ja: 校内でも有名な不良である風間堅次は、ある日偶然「ゲーム製作部」に足を踏み入れる。そこでは部室内で焚き火をする女子部員が…。
description.ru: Печально известный главарь банды Казама Кенжи наталкивается на группу странных девчонок, воображающих, что они владеют магией стихий. В итоге девчонки шантажируют его, чтобы он вступил в их клуб. Итак, приключения начинаются…
description.pt-br: Kazama Kenji acredita que ele é mais ou menos um delinquente. Além disso, outras pessoas parecem acreditar que ele é. Claro, a gangue do Kenji se encontra com um grupo de quatro garotas nada normais—Chitose, Sakura, Minami e Roka—de uma vez só, qualquer reputação que ele tenha não é nada comparado ao comportamento escandaloso das garotas. Forçados a se juntarem ao grupo delas, o que acontecerá com o seu dia-a-dia apartir de agora?

description.en:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。
description.es-la:
"En este reino, criaturas mitológicas deambulan, descendientes de los nueve cielos que llaman hogar."
Sibuxiang, un hombre-ciervo mitológico y perezoso, es expulsado del cielo y asignado a apoyar a las criaturas mitológicas que vagan por el mundo humano. Conoce y vive aventuras con sus amigos: el enérgico Pixiu amante de la comida llamado Pipi, el fanático conejo lunar Tony, los hermanos ratones Jinjiao y Yinjiao, también desterrados del cielo, y muchos otros. ¿Qué tipo de aventuras emprenderán?

altTitles.ja: ディー・グレイマン

description.en:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
description.ru: Действие манги разворачивается в альтернативной Европе конца 19 века. Мир заселен Акума - созданиями Тысячелетнего Графа, созданными из механизма и человеческой души. Те, кто могут уничтожать Акума и освобождать души заключенные в них, называются экзорцистами, которые наделены некой Чистой Силой. Главный герой манги - Аллен Уолкер, юноша пятнадцати лет, проклятый Акума, носитель Чистой Силы в его левой руке. Путь Аллена Уолкера связан с его любовью к людям и Акума, путь, который принесет ему много неожиданностей…
description.pt-br:
Perder um ente querido é tão doloroso que às vezes podemos desejar ressuscitá-lo - uma fraqueza que o enigmático Conde do Millennium explora. Para tornar suas armas mecânicas conhecidas como “Akuma”, ele usa as almas dos mortos que são chamadas de volta. Uma vez que uma alma é colocada em um Akuma, ela fica presa para sempre, e a única maneira de salvá-la é exorcizá-la de seu recipiente usando a arma Anti-Akuma, "Inocência".

Depois de passar três anos como discípulo do General Cross, Allen Walker é enviado para a Ordem Negra – uma organização composta por aqueles dispostos a lutar contra Akuma e o Conde do Milênio – para se tornar um Exorcista oficial. Com um braço como sua Inocência e um olho amaldiçoado que pode ver as almas sofredoras dentro de um Akuma, cabe a Allen e seus colegas Exorcistas impedir a trama final do Conde do Millennium: uma que pode levar à destruição do mundo.

altTitles.ja: 新テニスの王子様

description.en: The exclusive Japanese U-17 training camp was previously only open to the top high school players in the country. All of this changes when 50 of the nation's best middle school players are selected to join the esteemed training facility—including 12-year-old tennis prodigy Echizen Ryoma. But what seems like an ordinary training camp quickly becomes something far greater than any of the middle schoolers are expecting. The climb to the top of the Japanese tennis world is perilous, but even that journey pales in comparison to the world stage that awaits beyond the summit.

title.en: Blue Archive x Kamen Rider Decade - Story of Tsukasa Kadoya Sensei in Schale (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: シャーレの門矢士先生概念

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive x Kamen Rider Decade - Câu chuyện về thầy giáo Schale Kadoya Tsukasa

description.en: Anyone who is a fan of the Kamen Rider genre probably knows Kamen Rider Decade, also known as Kadoya Tsukasa;  world destroyer... The story is about Decade working as a sensei in the Blue Archive world

title.en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess Noble Lady

altTitles.zh: 恶魔女仆只想被恶役千金欺负

altTitles.zh-ro: Èmó nǚpū zhǐ xiǎng bèi è yì qiānjīn qīfù

altTitles.en: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess

description.en:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....

Tang Ran is a bright and cheerful little fox spirit. To graduate from the Monster Academy, she transforms into a human college student hoping to seduce a human and make them fall in love with her. However, little does she know that the reserved human female professor she has a crush on, Su Qingci, is actually a…

One lie leads to another. To make the other person fall in love with them first, the fox must spin an endless web of “lies.”

The daily experiences of modern monster girls.   
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.
description.pt-br:
As experiências diárias de garotas monstro modernas.
Quadrinhos originais por Shepherd0821

altTitles.ja: 悪党たちに育てられてます！

altTitles.pt-br: Eu estou sendo criada por vilões

description.en:
I thought I was an illegitimate child… but it turns out that I was a complete stranger?!

A year after transmigrating as an extra, I found out that I was on the verge of being kicked out.

I said I’d rather leave the house on my own.

“Actually, this child is my daughter. Right, daughter?”

Did I catch the attention of the psychopathic duke?

‘I heard that the money he gave after playing with someone was enough to buy an island?’

I got along with him as his daughter because I thought I could get his fortune later on. And a few months later, I would leave his house with a thick bank account.

“Stay by my side until I tell you to leave.”

However, my dad, who regarded me as a toy, came looking for me and held me back.

=

After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
description.tr: Gayrimeşru bir çocuk olduğumu sanıyordum… ama tamamen yabancı olduğum ortaya çıktı?! Yan karakter olarak beden değiştirdikten bir yıl sonra kovulmanın eşiğinde olduğumu öğrendim. Evden tek başıma çıkmayı tercih ederim dedim. “Aslında bu çocuk benim kızım. Değil mi kızım?” Psikopat dükün dikkatini mi çektim ? "Biriyle oynadıktan sonra verdiği paranın bir ada almaya yettiğini duydum?" Onunla kızı olarak iyi anlaştım çünkü daha sonra servetini ele geçirebileceğimi düşündüm ve birkaç ay sonra onun evinden kalın bir banka hesabıyla ayrılmayı planladım. "Sana gitmeni söyleyene kadar yanımda kal." Ancak beni oyuncak gibi gören babam beni aramaya geldi ve beni tuttu. *** Babamın iknasıyla eve döndükten sonra aileler ve babam beni evlat edinmek için mücadele etti. Amcalarım ve teyzelerim beni korumak için toplandılar ve geleceğin psikopatları bana karşı garip saplantılar beslemeye başladılar. "Doğum günün kutlu olsun Ayrin. Bugün itibariyle başkan sensin.” Üstelik Dük'ün konumu benim doğum günü hediyemdi. Her şey beklediğim gibi gidiyor. [Hey, daha ne kadar uyuyacaksın? Büyükanne sana tutucunu çıkarmanı söyledi!] [Cha Miso, öleceksin!] Bu ses nedir? Böyle iyi olacak mıyım?
description.pt-br: Negligenciada por sua família, Cha Miso sonha em viver em seu romance favorito como a amada personagem principal. Então, um dia, ela acorda dentro do romance, mas como Eiryn Etam, uma personagem secundária oprimida que será expulsa de sua casa! Para evitar mais negligência, ela planeja ir embora antes que isso aconteça. Mas quando Erno Etam, o herdeiro maluco da Casa Etam, afirma que Eiryn é sua filha, seus planos são frustrados e Eiryn se vê no meio de um conflito entre a Casa Etam e um elenco de vilões.

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, overworked salaryman Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).
description.ja:
狐を拾ったら、嫁がれました。

三十路手前のサラリーマン、日野峰吾郎は、とある理由で嫁ぎ遅れた化け狐、こがねを助けたことで恩返しと称した求婚を迫られる。こがねを無下にすることもできず、吾郎は「1年間の同棲を経て妻として認められたら結婚する」という条件を提案することに。果たしてこがねは無事に嫁ぐことができるのか？

altTitles.ja: DEAD Tube ～デッドチューブ～

altTitles.zh: 学園殺人ゲーム Dead Tube

description.en: Distributing thrilling videos in secret! A school game that puts life and death on the line!
description.ja: 映画研究部に所属する業得学園2年・町谷智浩は学園トップクラスの美少女・真城舞に、ある日突然、声をかけられる。なんでも2日間だけ、24時間完全密着の撮影をしてほしいとのこと。同行する町谷だったが……!?
description.kk: Мектеп оқушылары киноклубта не түсіреді? Күнделікті өмірдің бөлшектері, әуесқой қорқынышты фильмдер... бұның бәрі зеріктіріп жібереді... бірақ бұл жолы емес! Басты кейіпкер Томохиро Мачиге, киноклуб операторы, мектептегі қыз бірнеше күнге оны түсіруді ұсынады. Ол ерекше ынталы емес болсада, бірақ ол да бас тартпайды. Егер жігіт бұл оның өміріндегі ең қызықты және қорқынышты фильм болатынын білгенде...
description.ru: Что могут снимать школьники в клубе любителей кино? Зарисовки из повседневности, любительские фильмы ужасов… скука полная… но только не в этот раз! Главному герою Томохиро Мачии, оператору киноклуба, одна девушка из школы предлагает поснимать её несколько дней. Он особо не горит желанием, но и не отказывается. Если бы парень только знал, что это будет самый захватывающий и будоражащий фильм в его жизни…

altTitles.ja: バガボンド

description.en:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
description.es:
Creciendo en el Japón de la era Sengoku de finales del siglo XVI, Shinmen Takezou es rechazado por los aldeanos locales como un niño demonio debido a su naturaleza salvaje y violenta. A los 17 años, Takezou se escapa de casa con un compañero y se une al ejército Toyotomi para luchar contra el clan Tokugawa en la batalla de Sekigahara. Sin embargo, los Tokugawa obtienen una aplastante victoria, lo que da lugar a casi trescientos años de gobierno del Shogunato. Takezou y su amigo consiguen sobrevivir a la batalla y después juran hacer grandes cosas con sus vidas. Sin embargo, cuando sus caminos se separan, Takezou se convierte en un criminal buscado y debe cambiar su nombre y su naturaleza para escapar de una muerte innoble.  
  
**Premios:**
    - Ganó el 24º Premio Kodansha de Manga en la categoría general en 2000.
    - Ganó el Premio Cultural Tezuka Osamu en 2002
    **Nota:** fue nominado al Premio Eisner 2003 en la categoría de Mejor Escritor/Artista.

altTitles.ja: 願いのアストロ

description.en:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
description.fr: Le nouveau manga de Ken Wakui, le créateur de Shinjuku Swan et Tokyo Revengers ! Alors que la bataille pour désigner le prochain chef du clan Yotsurugi qui dirige Asakusa s'intensifie, la chute d'une météorite réveille soudainement des super-pouvoirs chez les Japonais. Comment Hibaru Yotsurugi, le fils du précédent boss du clan va-t-il s'en sortir ?

title.en: I Became the Mother of the Evil Male Lead

altTitles.en: I Became the Mother of the Tragic Male Lead
I Became the Mother of the Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Mother of a Bloody Male Lead
I Became the Bloodthirsty Male Lead's Mother

altTitles.fr: Je suis la mère du anti-héros

altTitles.pt-br: Eu me tornei a mãe do protagonista louco

altTitles.es: Reencarne cómo la madre del protagonista masculino loco obsesionado

altTitles.es-la: Me convertí en la madre del protagonista masculino que era un producto de desecho

altTitles.th: ฉันกลายเป็นแม่พระเอกนิยายจอมเสเพล

altTitles.ja: 闇堕ち主人公のママになりました

altTitles.zh: 成为颓废文男主的妈妈

description.en: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?
